Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section and contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of four lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393897) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393897)
